title: Alternate Beginning
description: Y2K was never meant to happen...but it did. Top secret government program sends their best agent, John Titor, to fix the past. The world John knew has now changed for the worst, Y2K may have been avoided, but terrorists have different plans for the fate of the world. September 11, 2001 is John and his teamâ€™s new destination in time. Will altering the beginning change the destiny of humanity?After all, time travel is tricky business.
author: B.C. Snyder
